name: Classic Visual Novel [this name will change later]
name_original: Classic Visual Novel [this name will change later]
description:
Based on the theme of "Visual Novel Jam" made by: Krish28 - itch.io

You are a musician and composer who is passing through trouble. For months you have been writing a sonata based on strange dreams that keep repeating themselves every night.

Two diabolical figures play the violin and the piano, a strange and beautiful music never before imagined by the great composers.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is absolutely incomplete. I am new to this medium of jams and have never made a visual novel, so thank you again Krish28 - itch.io for promoting this jam.

I liked the idea and I will keep developing it, wait for it! Suggestions, comments and help are always welcome.
